Package fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.architectures

Architectures of DEVS simulation models.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ModelDescriptorI
    The interface ModelDescriptorI defines method implemented by all model descriptors.
    RTAtomicModelDescriptor.RTSchedulerProviderFI
    The functional interface RTSchedulerProviderFI types a lambda-expression which execution returns a real time scheduler that is meant to be attached to a real time atomic model.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAtomicModelDescriptor
    The class AbstractAtomicModelDescriptor implements a descriptor for atomic models to be included in simulation architectures overall descrpitions.
    AtomicModelDescriptor
    The class AtomicModelDescriptor describes atomic models in DEVS simulation architectures, associating their instantiation class, their URI, their imported and exported event types, as well as a factory that can be used to instantiate a model object to run simulations.
    CoupledModelDescriptor
    The class CoupledModelDescriptor defines coupled models in simulation architectures, associating their URI, their static information, as well as an optional factory that can be used to instantiate a coupled model object to run simulations.
    ModelComposer
    The class ModelComposer provides methods implementing model composition; it is abstract as it only defines static methods.
    RTAtomicModelDescriptor
    The class RTAtomicModelDescriptor describes real time atomic models in DEVS simulation architectures.
    RTCoupledModelDescriptor
    The class RTCoupledModelDescriptor defines real time coupled models in model architectures.

Package fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.architectures Description

Architectures of DEVS simulation models.

The fact that you are presently reading this means that you have had knowledge of the CeCILL-C license and that you accept its terms.

This package implements architectures of DEVS simulation models. In this library, architectures are descriptions of models that must be instantiated and connected in order to form a composed model ready to be run. The package fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.architectures defines the overall architectures. This package defines the descriptions of atomic and coupled models that are included into overall architectures.
